```{r}
x <- c(4, 6, 6, 7, 8, 12, 15, 17, 20, 21, 21, 23, 24, 27, 28)
print(IQR(x)) 
```

```{r}
interquartile_range <- function(value_vector){
  n <- length(value_vector)
  q1 <- (n+1)/4
  q3 <- (3*(n+1))/4
  
  IQR <- value_vector[q3] - value_vector[q1]
  
  return(list(value_vector[q1], value_vector[q3], IQR))
}

vector_test <- c(4, 6, 6, 7, 8, 12, 15, 17, 20, 21, 21, 23, 24, 27, 28)

interquartile_range(vector_test)
```
